original_text: As the king and his officers heard Jehudi read each section of the scroll, it did not make them afraid. None of them tore their clothes because they were upset.
korean_text: 왕과 그의 신하들이 이 모든 말을 듣고도 두려워하거나 자기들의 옷을 찢지 아니하였고

sentences.original_text: As the king and his officers heard Jehudi read each section
sentences.korean_translation: 왕과 그의 신하들이 여후디가 각 부분을 읽는 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: it did not make them afraid
None of them tore their clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 아무도 자기 옷을 찢지 않았다
